attributes.text: Out-of-the-Box Microsoft Reporting Tools are Complex, Inefficient, and Unreliable

attributes.richTextValue:
Your Most Valuable Resources are Manually Copying and Pasting


When your finance team is forced to compile data and format reports manually, they don’t have time to analyze and provide financial insight.

Reporting Data are Being Questioned by Executives in the Boardroom


The likelihood of errors and inaccuracies only goes up with manual processes and the more data sources you have.

You Need Technical Expertise to Access Microsoft Dynamics Data and Write Reports


﻿It’s hard to deliver results and drive performance improvements when you don’t have the skills to build your own reports and dashboards.
